00022 /// @file   QuantMethodSnpqcSummary.h
00023 /// @brief  Class for accumulating some snpqc metrics from a list of probeset names.
00024 
00025 #ifndef QUANTMETHODSNPQCSUMMARY_H
00026 #define QUANTMETHODSNPQCSUMMARY_H
00027 
00028 //
00029 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00030 #include "chipstream/ChipSummary.h"
00031 #include "chipstream/GenderCalls.h"
00032 #include "chipstream/QuantGTypeMethod.h"
00033 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/SpecialSnps.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/SummaryStats.h"
00036 //
00037 #include "stats/stats.h"
00038 #include "util/Err.h"
00039 #include "util/Util.h"
00040 //
00041 #include <cfloat>
00042 #include <iostream>
00043 #include <string>
00044 #include <vector>
00045 
00046 class QuantMethodSnpqcChipSummary : public QuantMethodReport, public ChipSummary {
00047 
00048 private:
00049   //
00050   enum CallType {
00051       ct_processed_count = 0,
00052       ct_hom,
00053       ct_het,
00054       ct_none,
00055       ct__size,
00056   };
00057 
00058 public: 
00059 
00060   QuantMethodSnpqcChipSummary(const std::string& analysisName,
00061                           const std::string& metricPrefix) {
00062     setValid(false);
00063     m_AnalysisName = analysisName;
00064     m_MetricPrefix = metricPrefix;
00065     //
00066     setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
00067     setFilename("QuantMethodSnpqcSummary-DEBUG"); // for debugging, not used.
00068 
00069     // the count of probesetids in the input file.
00070     declareMetric(m_MetricPrefix+"_file_count",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00071     // count of probesets processed this snpqc
00072     declareMetric(m_MetricPrefix+"_processed_count",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00073     // % of probesets which have a call. (Not No-call)
00074     declareMetric(m_MetricPrefix+"_call_rate",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00075     // % of probesets which are AB
00076     declareMetric(m_MetricPrefix+"_het_rate",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00077     // % of probesets which are AA or BB
00078     declareMetric(m_MetricPrefix+"_hom_rate",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00079     //
00080     m_Calls.resize(ct__size);
00081   }
00082 
00083   void setProbesetNames(const std::vector<std::string>& names) {
00084     m_ProbesetNames=names;
00085     /// we keep the probeset names sorted for quick lookup
00086     sort(m_ProbesetNames.begin(),m_ProbesetNames.end());
00087   }
00088      
00089   bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00090     // resize our m_Calls to match the number of chips.
00091     int chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00092     m_Calls.resize(ct__size);
00093     for (int i=0; i<m_Calls.size(); i++) {
00094       m_Calls[i].resize(chipCount);
00095     }
00096     return true;
00097   }
00098 
00099   bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00100               QuantMethod &qMethod,
00101               const IntensityMart &iMart,
00102               std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00103               PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) 
00104   {
00105     // check we have a QuantMethod which does genotyping.
00106     QuantGTypeMethod *gMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantGTypeMethod *>(&qMethod);
00107     if (gMethod == NULL) {
00108       Err::errAbort("Can only use a QuantMethodSnpqcReport with QuantGTypeMethods.");
00109     }
00110 
00111     // Is this probeset group part of our reporting set?
00112     std::string psName=gMethod->getProbeSetName();
00113     if (binary_search(m_ProbesetNames.begin(),m_ProbesetNames.end(),psName)==false) {
00114       // if not, stop processing it
00115       return true;
00116     }
00117     // yep!
00118     // Verbose::out(1,"QuantMethodSnpqcChipSummary::report()  psName='"+(psName)+"'");
00119 
00120     // accum the metrics.
00121     for (int i=0; i<gMethod->getNumCalls(); i++) {
00122       affx::GType call = gMethod->getGTypeCall(i);
00123       m_Calls[ct_processed_count][i]++;
00124       //
00125       if ((call==affx::AA) || (call==affx::BB)){
00126         m_Calls[ct_hom][i]++;
00127       }
00128       else if (call == affx::AB) {
00129         m_Calls[ct_het][i]++;
00130       }
00131       else if (call==affx::NN) {
00132         m_Calls[ct_none][i]++;
00133       }
00134       else {
00135         Err::errAbort("Not a good good call. (AA,AB,BB,NN)");
00136       }
00137     }
00138     return true;
00139   }
00140 
00141   bool reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00142                      const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00143                      PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00144     
00145     // do nothing.
00146     return true;
00147   }
00148   
00149   bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) {
00150     for (size_t chip = 0; chip < m_Calls[ct_processed_count].size(); chip++) {
00151       // cast to double for math.
00152       double processed_count=m_Calls[ct_processed_count][chip];
00153       //
00154       setMetric(chip,m_MetricPrefix+"_file_count",
00155                 (double(m_ProbesetNames.size())));
00156       setMetric(chip,m_MetricPrefix+"_processed_count",
00157                 processed_count);
00158       setMetric(chip,m_MetricPrefix+"_call_rate",
00159                 (double(100.0*(m_Calls[ct_het][chip]+m_Calls[ct_hom][chip])/processed_count)));
00160       setMetric(chip,m_MetricPrefix+"_het_rate",
00161                 (double(100.0*m_Calls[ct_het][chip]/processed_count)));
00162       setMetric(chip,m_MetricPrefix+"_hom_rate",
00163                 (double(100.0*m_Calls[ct_hom][chip]/processed_count)));
00164     }
00165     //
00166     setValid(true);
00167     return true;
00168   }
00169 
00170 private:
00171   /// The name of our analysis.
00172   std::string m_AnalysisName;
00173   /// The prefix of our qc calls. (SNPQC)
00174   std::string m_MetricPrefix;
00175   ///
00176   std::vector<std::string> m_ProbesetNames;
00177   /// Keep track of call counts per chip. Indexes are CallType enum
00178   std::vector<std::vector<int> > m_Calls;
00179 };
00180 
00181 #endif /* QUANTMETHODSNPQCSUMMARY_H */
